data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sullivan, John P., Hopkins, Carl D. (2004): A new Stomatorhinus (Osteoglossomorpha: Mormyridae) from the Ivindo River, Gabon, West Central Africa. Zootaxa 847: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157189
